body: No need for this fix for now.
+1 LGTM. Thanks for fixing this. Sorry about introducing this issue when making the changes in https://github.com/apache/incubator-gobblin/pull/2355/files.

@htran1 @abti @sushantpande Resubmitted the PR as per the suggestions.
https://github.com/apache/incubator-gobblin/pull/2386

@treff7es comment makes sense to me. I am ok with the general idea of the changes, although I don't remember the details of the change. If someone reviews it I have no problem with this being committed.

Hi @sv2000,
Can you point a design doc for this PR to start with?  That might accelerates the reviewing process. Thanks !

@HappyRay How were you able to resolve the following failure:

```idl compatibility report:
Incompatible changes:

Resource for "/home/travis/build/apache/incubator-gobblin/gobblin-rest-service/gobblin-rest-api/src/main/snapshot/org.apache.gobblin.rest.jobExecutions.snapshot.json" is not found. This endpoint will not be released. Please remove this file and build again

I guess no was trying to consume expected records #, so this went uncovered until now :)
@sv2000 Checked-in enhancement to apply retention on remote HDFS. Please review

@sv2000 Initializing targetFs in DatasetCleanerJob will require overloading method in DatasetCleaner to add another argument for targetFs or overload method to take State, since sourceFs is required to read the configuration.
@sv2000 Initialized targetFs in DatasetCleanerJob and defaulted to localFs. Also reverted the changes made to MultiDatasetFinder.java
@htran1 Can you review this PR? Note: I am still adding unit tests. But I wanted to get early feedback from you. The main class is DagManager.java.
@enjoyear Remember to fix the build issue

@sv2000 (and @ibuenros maybe), could you review this PR - I think it should be able to be merged, pending any changes you think might be needed ...
One thing I am unsure about is whether decrypt and ungzip/tararchive copy jobs are handled properly (i.e. in the Decrypt/UnGzip Converters and the TarArchiveInputStreamDataWriter) if they also have the split enabled flag set; maybe we need to not allow jobs that use these converters to do splitting?
@htran1 Please take a look at the changes. Thanks!
Closing this PR since WormholePushJob is an internal LinkedIn product.
@sv2000 @htran1 please review when you have the chance

I moved the retrieval of the block locations from DistcpFileSplitter to within GobblinWorkUnitsInputFormat by adding three GobblinSplit specific properties to ConfigurationKeys - file path, file low position (offset), & file high position. This information can be set by sources (in the distcp case, the CopySource/DistcpFileSplitter), and will then be used to get the block locations.

The properties do have some overlap/duplication with properties which may already be there (i.e for distcp, the serialized copyable file stored in the work unit should already contain the file path, and the serialized split if it exists would already contain the low and high position), but these properties provide something more general that can be used by the GobblinWorkUnitsInputFormat.getSplits method without requiring any dependencies from gobblin-runtime on for example the DistcpFileSplitter.Split class in the gobblin-data-management module.
@sv2000 Added an option to configure timezone (org.joda.time.DateTimeZone) to LocalDateTime for TimeAwareRecursiveCopyableDataset. Defaulted to PT timezone, if timezone property not defined.
@amarnathkarthik The travis build failed. Can you take a look?
@treff7es, can you review? I heard you were interested in this connector.
@htran1 Sure, my colleagues are just testing it and we plan to write the documentation for that.
@zxcware - Opened a new PR (https://github.com/apache/incubator-gobblin/pull/2512) and closing this one. Please review that one as I have incorporated your comments there.
@htran1  @ibuenros  @abti  can you please take a look ? Thanks.

@sv2000 (and @htran1), I implemented a `RackLocalGobblinWorkUnitsInputFormat` that has similar split data locality logic to the `CombineFileInputFormat`, on top of some refactoring of the previous locality stuff that I did within the `GobblinWorkUnitsInputFormat` itself. Would appreciate if you could take a look ...
@abti @zxcware This seems to be waiting merge and hasn't been released. Any reason why its on hold?

That version was not tested. We have a newer version with single record
request tested and plan to make it open source soon.
